messages.title: MARTIN WILL ALWAYS OPPOSE BREAKING UP THE UK
messages.content: Martin campaigned to remain in the UK in 2014 and as our MP has spoken out, against independence.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Martin campaigned to remain in the UK in 2014 and as our MP has spoken out against independence.
Martin has opposed a hard or no-deal Brexit. He wants a final say and will campaign for remain.
The SNP slashed £25 million in funding for our schools and other local council services.
The SNP have failed local rail users. Martin is campaigning for modern, reliable local rail services.
The SNP closed Haddington’s court and have taken our public services to breaking point.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for me on 12 December is the only way to beat the SNP in East Lothian.

issues.brexitEurope: Martin has opposed a hard or no-deal Brexit. He wants a final say and will campaign for remain.
issues.education: The SNP slashed £25 million in funding for our schools and other local council services.
issues.governance: Martin campaigned to remain in the UK in 2014 and as our MP has spoken out, against independence.

leaflet.personalStatement: "I have always put East Lothian’s interests first, including standing up for the majority who want Scotland to remain part of the UK."

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Ryan Norton, on behalf of Martin Whitfield at 65 High Street, Tranent, EH33 1LN

images.caption: Martin Whitfield pictured in East Lothian.
